comments.body: Thought this was some shitcoin ad but I really love the epic Bitcoin ark vid

comments.body: I don't see a new coin on that video like what the title says, where in it shows only about the bitcoin situation. But it so funny tbh. Lol and very accurate on what always happen after the declined in the market.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Quote from: Guessti on June 17, 2022, 06:19:59 AMhttps://twitter.com/naiivememe/status/1537043651817512960 Lol you got me there   Nice post here  QuoteDon't worry.This stands  for all as the assurance is there and Yes , we must not worry at all because we are now in the Bottom and any time soon? the climb will start to bring it on  Please continue bringing like this post here mate , as we all needs most like this .

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: The bears are closing off soon and every light will be turned again with green all over. We just need a little more time for this to pass. We never forget this season all the time but it goes away someday.

comments.author: STT
comments.body: Ok bit of a fantasy video but the main take away I agree with is massive volatility occurs and upset, obviously the fall of even a little government like Greece a few years back was causing monumental disruptive waves and in the end it was so tiny the larger parts of the EU just absorbed it all.   Wasn't fixed because it was down to fraud really and should not have been upheld for the tax payers to carry as a burden for generations.   The people suffering from that debt today as new workers and families weren't even alive when it was agreed to and thats why the traditional system we know now likely doesnt continue because the trillions accumulated are in no way fair or conducive to capitalism.   Dont let anyone you know say it was capitalism that failed, centralism and central banks isnt capitalism, its politics.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: It's a cool video, a little bit funny but it has make sense.  It's really relevant, do you think who made it?  In the video clip, I saw there the laser eye of Noah on the Arc which is a symbolic way of Bitcoin bull cheering, your 1 Bitcoin will remain 1 Bitcoin if you didn't sell anything.  Anyway, I didn't see the next big coin coming there, you might mean that Bitcoin will recurrence soon.I believed that those who patiently wait and keep holding during a bear market will get a reward soon the same thought as shown in the video.

But it so funny tbh. Lol and very accurate on what always happen after the declined in the market.   I seem to be watching like you mate, and I don't see it but have I missed it? I really appreciate the making of this and show the real.hopefully indeed hope that it will return to green where the change will occur.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: Yeah, I thought it was a shit memecoin called naive meme token or something as well before I clicked on the video. It really shows what I feel towards crypto as well. Everyone could attack it, but at the end of the day hyperinflation is real and it is going on all around the world right now, some more than the others but everyone is getting worse. This means that we should not be really focusing on anything that is outside attack, we should only trust crypto and we should always believe in bitcoin.The video is awesome and it is telling the truth and it is showing the world why we are investing into bitcoin and why we prefer it over any other fiat in the world.

comments.author: Myleschetty
comments.body: Quote from: lepbagong on June 29, 2022, 02:44:02 PMQuote from: Ararbermas on June 17, 2022, 10:46:10 AMI don't see a new coin on that video like what the title says, where in it shows only about the bitcoin situation. But it so funny tbh. Lol and very accurate on what always happen after the declined in the market.   I seem to be watching like you mate, and I don't see it but have I missed it? I really appreciate the making of this and show the real.hopefully indeed hope that it will return to green where the change will occur.Yes, there's always hope that the market will turn green when it's time and any never panic or doubts the market comes back is totally the people who don't understand the concept of the market or who only see crypto as a quick to the rich scheme.In the meantime, I like the meme posted by the OP.
